DOC.brief_title: Fructose Ethnic Differences Study ( FED Study )

DOC.criteria: Selfreported healthy , confirmed blood test ( i.e . liver enzymes , full blood count , lipid , glucose ) ; ethnicity White European participant least 3 grandparent originate country Europe Black African participant least 3 grandparent originate primarily country West Africa ( Economic Community West African States ( ECOWAS ) central African country ( e.g . Cameroon , Uganda , etc ) . fast glucose diabetic range ( fast glucose > 7 mmol/l ) ; hypertension ( medically diagnose > 140/90 mm Hg screen ) ; hyperlipidaemia deem require immediate medical intervention ( define : total cholesterol > 6.0 mmol/l ; LDLcholesterol > 4.5 mmol/l ; fast TG > 3 mmol/l ) .
